sentence.text: The aim of our study was to determine the negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II of genetic polymorphisms in the caspase (protein stabilization) genes on prognosis of hepatocellular carcinoma (phosphatidylinositol phosphorylation).

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: We genotyped 7 potentially functional polymorphisms in protein stabilization3, CASP7, CASP8, CASP9, CASP10 genes in 362 phosphatidylinositol phosphorylation patients of receiving surgical resection of HCC tumor.
